topic.title: Apples
topic.shortdesc: Apples are globally popular fruits known for their variety and nutritional benefits. As a widely consumed fruit, they are a significant part of many diets and cultures.

body.p: Apples are one of the most popular fruits in the world. There are many different types of apples including red, green, and yellow ones. Apples have been cultivated for thousands of years and are eaten by people all over the globe. Not only are apples delicious, but they also contain many vitamins that are good for health. However, it is important to wash them before eating because pesticides might still be on the skin.
